      • addSimilarBookNodes

        public void addSimilarBookNodes(BookNode similarBookNode)
        This method adds a related Book based of the genres it has if the book has 3 or more similar genres, then it is a related book.
        Parameters:
        similarBookNode - the book to check its genres
